data: Translate: Group Discussion - Agreeing with Others
Translate: Group Discussion - Agreeing with Others
Check your understanding of how to agree with someone's point in a group discussion.

first_message: Hey there! Now I will give you 10 sentences to translate into English.This activity is just for my understanding on how well you know this concept so don't worry about making any mistakes. Can we start?
